chapter.text: haa meeem
qasam hai is wazaahath waali kitaab ki
yaqinan hum ne ise ba-barkath raath mein utaara hai, beshak hum daraane waale hai
osi raath mein har ek mazbooth kaam ka faisla kiya jaata hai
hamaare paas se hukm ho kar hum hee hai rasool bana kar bhejne waale
aap ke rab ki meherbaani se, wo hee hai sunne waala jaanne waala
jo rab hai asmaano ka aur zameen ka aur jo kuch un ke darmiyaan hai agar tum yaqeen karne waale ho
koyi maboodh nahi us ke siva, wahi jilaata hai aur maarta hai wahi tumhaara rab hai aur tumhaare agle baap dadaao ka
balke wo shak mein pade khel rahe hai
aap us din ke muntazir rahe jab ke asmaan zaaher dhua layega
jo logo ko gher lega, ye dardnaak azaab hai
kahenge ke aye hamaare rab! ye aafath hum se door kar, hum imaan qubool karte hai
un ke liye nasihath kahaa hai? khol khol kar bayaan karne waale paighambar un ke paas aa chuke
phir bhi unhone un se mu phera aur keh diya ke sikhaaya padaaya hoa bawla hai
hum azaab ko thoda door kar denge to tum phir apni osi haalath par aa jaoge
jis din hum badi saqth pakad pakdenge bil yaqeen hum badhla lene waale hai
yaqinan un se pehle hum khaum feraun ko (bhi) aazma chuke hai jin ke paas (Allah ka) ba-izzath rasool aaya
ke Allah ta’ala ke bandho ko mere hawaale kardo, yaqeen maano ke main tuhaare liye amaanat-daar rasool hoon
aur tum Allah ta’ala ke saamne sarkashi na karo, main tumhaare paas kholi daleel laane waala hoon
aur main apne aur tumhaare rab ki panaah mein aata hoon, us se ke tum mujhe sangsaar kardo
aur agar tum mujh par imaan nahi laate to mujh se alag hee raho
phir unhone apne rab se dua ki, ke ye sab gunehgaar log hai
(hum ne keh diya) ke raatho raath tu mere bandho ko le kar nikal, yaqinan tumhara picha kiya jayega
to tu darya ko saakin1 chohd kar chala ja, bila shuba ye lashkar gharq kar diya jayega
wo bahuth se baghaath aur chashme chohd gaye
aur khetiyaa aur raahath baqsh thikaane
aur wo araam ki chize jin mein aysh kar rahe thein
osi tarah ho gaya aur hum ne un sab ka waaris dosri khaum ko bana diya
so un par na to asmaan wa zameen roye aur na unhe mahullat mili
aur beshak hum ne (hee) bani israel ko (saqth) ruswa kun saza se najaath di
(jo) feraun ki taraf se (ho rahi) thi, fil waaqe wo sarkash aur hadh se guzar jaane waalo mein se tha
aur hum ne daanista taur par bani israel ko dunya jahaan waalo par fauqiyath di
aur hum ne unhe aisi nishaaniya di jin mein sarih azmaayesh thi
ye log to yahi kehte hai
ke (aaqri cheez) yahi hamaara pehli baar (dunya se) mar jaana hai aur hum dobaara uthaaye nahi jayenge
agar tum sacche ho to hamaare baap dadaao ko le aao
kya ye log behtar hai ya tubbah ki khaum aur jo in se bhi pehle thein, hum ne un sab ko halaak kar diya, yaqinan wo gunehgaar thein
hum ne zameen aur asmaano aur un ke darmiyaan ki cheezo ko khel ke taur par payda nahi kiya
balke hum ne unhe durusth tadhbeer ke saath hee payda kiya hai, lekin un mein se aksar log nahi jaante
yaqinan faysle ka din un sab ka tay shuda waqth hai
us din koyi dosth kisi dosth ke kuch bhi kaam na ayega aur na un ki imdaad ki jayegi
magar jis par Allah ki meherbaani ho jaaye, wo zabardasth aur rahem karne waala hai
beshak zaqqoom (tohar) ka daraqth
gunehgaar ka khaana hai
jo misl til-chat ke hai, pet mein khaulta rehta hai
misl tez garam paani ke
ose pakad lo phir ghasithte hoye beech jahannam tak pahonchaao
phir us ke sar par saqth garam paani ka azaab bahaao
(us se kaha jayega) chakta ja, tu to bada zi izzath aur bade ekraam waala tha
yahi wo cheez hai jis mein tum shak kiya karte thein
beshak (Allah se) darne waale aman chayn ki jageh mein honge
baagh aur chashmo mein
baarik aur dabeez resham ke libaas pehne hoye aamne saamne baithe honge
ye isi tara hai aur hum badi badi aankho waali huro se un ka nikaah kar denge
dil jamyi ke saath wahaa har tarah ke mewo ki farmaayeshe karte honge
wahaa wo mauth chakne ke nahi hai, haan pehli mauth (jo wo mar chuke) unhe Allah ta’ala ne dozakh ki saza se bacha diya
ye sirf tere rab ka fazl hai, yahi hai badi kamyaabi
hum ne is Qur’aan ko teri zabaan mein asaan kar diya ta ke wo nasihath haasil kare
ab tu muntzir reh, ye bhi muntazir hai
